long_desc.thetext:
If I call to a table this: myTable.setKeepFirstVisibleRowComplete(false) before it is added to a container, I receive this exception:
Modification of property "keepFirstVisibleRowComplete" failed with exception: TypeError - this.getParent() has no properties
If I add it to a container, then I receive this other exception:
Modification of property "keepFirstVisibleRowComplete" failed with exception: TypeError - vCurrentChild has no properties
It seems unavoidable to receive an exception. Apart from the exception, it seems to work ok.
Workaround:
myTable.forceKeepFirstVisibleRowComplete(false)
doesn't produce an exception.
You have a sample of this bug in class qx.ui.form.ComboBoxEx. Search for forceKeepFirstVisibleRowComplete, and change it to setKeepFirstVisibleRowComplete, and you will get an exception. You can use html/example/ComboBoxEx_1.html
Closed all bugs already shipped with a release.
